fields.label: Display city and state by phone number
fields.name: display_city_state
fields.instructions: This is for firms with only a single location displayed in the header. If the Show additional locations in header option is checked the city and state will be displayed by each phone number and this option will be disabled.

fields.label: Display free consultation call to action by phone number
fields.name: free_consult_tel

fields.label: Change menu items horizontal alignment
fields.name: menu_items_justifiy
fields.instructions: Change how the menu items are spaced horizontally. If there are only a few menu items change this to Align to center of menu.

fields.label: Hero Style
fields.name: hero_style
fields.instructions: Select the hero image and slogan style.

fields.label: Alternative sticky header logo
fields.name: sticky_header_logo
fields.instructions: Will replace the default logo in sticky header if present.

fields.label: Use an image or video for the hero?
fields.name: image_or_video_hero-bg

fields.label: Hero video mobile / tablet image
fields.name: hero_video_mobile_image
fields.instructions: Will replace the video on mobile and tablet devices to increase site speed.

fields.label: Use a Youtube embed or MP4 video file?
fields.name: video-youtube-or-mp4

fields.label: Hero video Youtube
fields.name: hero_video-youtube
fields.instructions: Insert the text string in the Youtube URL that comes after "?v=". For example for this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7aAH4eVrVp8 paste only "7aAH4eVrVp8" without the quotation marks.

fields.label: Hero image or video overlay color
fields.name: vid_overlay-color
fields.instructions: Each option correlates to the site's color scheme and the variables set in the _variables.scss file. Review with the developer if you are not sure which option is which color.

choices.gradient: Gradient of primary and secondary colors

fields.label: Hero Image
fields.name: hero_image
fields.instructions: The default hero image, displays up to 575px wide.

fields.label: Webp Hero Image
fields.name: webp_hero_image
fields.instructions: Will serve an webp format image if supported by the browser, this is optional but recommended to improve mobile site speed.

fields.label: XL Hero Image
fields.name: hero_image_xl
fields.instructions: Image for xtra large devices ( 1200px and up )

fields.label: Additional animation slides
fields.name: animation_slides
fields.instructions: Add animation slides here, the hero image you selected will be the first image in the animation.

sub_fields.label: Webp Hero Image
sub_fields.name: webp_hero_image
sub_fields.instructions: Will serve an webp format image if supported by the browser, this is optional but recommended to improve mobile site speed.

fields.label: Hero Slogan
fields.name: hero_slogan
fields.instructions: Enter a tagline, slogan, or messaging to appear on top of the hero image.

fields.label: Hero slogan carousel
fields.name: hero_slogan_carousel
fields.instructions: Enter a short description to go with the slogan. NOTE not all templates have a space for the hero description.

fields.label: Hero button text
fields.name: hero_read_more_text
fields.instructions: Note: Doesn't appear in all header options

fields.label: Hero button URL
fields.name: hero_read_more
fields.instructions:
Note: Doesn't appear in all header options

Destination of "Read More" link below main slogan and description. Use a relative link by copy and pasting the text after .com for the destination URL.
